messages.subject: Having support in unschooling?
messages.msgSnippet: The November topic for Unschooling Voices is: On the topic of support in unschooling...how much do you have from family & friends? Are there other unschoolers
messages.messageBody:
The November topic for Unschooling Voices is:

On the topic of support in unschooling...how much do you have from
family & friends? Are there other unschoolers near you or do you belong
to an offline unschooling group? How important is having that support?

I'll add the replies to the November edition when it comes out on 11/1.
If you have a blog, you can also answer it there and then send me the
link. :-)

Thanks!

~ Joanne ~
Mom to Jacqueline (8), Shawna (11) & Cimion (14)
Adopted into our hearts October 2003
************************************
Unschooling Voices ~ Add Your Voice
www.foreverparents.com/UnschoolingVoices.html
